column1: # Special Chain — Root out secrets at your court, by Linnéa Thimrén:""

щоб мені ніколи більше не доводилося хвилюватися про свою безпеку."

column3:
що ведуть до найзатишніших кімнат і до внутрішніх садів.

#EMP  Чи не безглуздо було приходити сюди? Можливо мені#!... Кроки! З тіні коридору нечутно виходить постать.

А що тут робить [sneaky_courtier.GetTitledFirstName]?"

column1: intrigue_scheming_special.1302.b0:"Потрібно точно дізнатися. Я продовжу стежити за [Select_CString(sneaky_courtier.IsFemale

column1: intrigue_scheming_special.1303.desc_sneak_win0:"Мені вдається йти абсолютно безшумно: [sneaky_courtier.GetTitledFirstName] не помічає

column1: intrigue_scheming_special.1304.desc_found0:"Передчуття не обдурили мене! Варто мені знову зникнути в тіні

column8: 'задумував' )] [sneaky_courtier.GetSheHe]щось проти мене чи ні... Але моє розслідування багато чого мене навчило. Наступного разу я не блукатиму наосліп!"

column1: intrigue_scheming_special.1350.a0:"Чи була [sneaky_courtier.GetHerHis] смерть вдалим збігом обставин чи просто збігом?"
intrigue_scheming_special.1398.desc0:"«На чому ґрунтуються подібні звинувачення?! - запитує мене [sneaky_courtier.GetTitledFirstName]

column5: [sneaky_courtier.GetSheHe] навіть не намагається захищатися.\n\nУся ця історія дала мені важливий урок про довіру і пильність

column1: # An Anonymous Informant by Chad Uhl:""
realm_has_more_than_2_siegeable_holdings_trigger_desc0:"Two or more of the enemy's holdings can be sieged"
realm_has_more_than_2_siegeable_holdings_trigger_desc_not0:"Fewer than 2 of the enemy's holdings can be sieged"

intrigue_scheming.1801.desc0:"My [spymaster.GetCouncilTitle] [spymaster.GetFirstName] rushes into the room and hands me an anonymous letter [spymaster.GetSheHe] has just received. It appears we have a unique opportunity to acquire information about [enemy.GetTitledFirstNamePossessive] defense strategies.

The letter reads:

If you desire information about [enemy.GetFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] defenses
column2: have your [spymaster.GetCouncilTitle] [spymaster.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] meet me in [meeting_place.GetName] within a fortnight. Bring plenty of gold."""""

column1: intrigue_scheming.1801.a0:"I would be a fool not to investigate this."
intrigue_scheming.1801.b0:"This is nothing but empty extortion."
intrigue_scheming.1802.intro_desc0:"[spymaster.GetFirstName] has returned from meeting with the anonymous informant. With a grave look on [spymaster.GetHerHis] face
column2: [spymaster.GetSheHe] spreads out a sheaf of parchment inscribed with what appear to be my enemy's defense tactics."
these schematics for [enemy.GetFirstNamePossessive] defense plans seem as genuine as they could be."

column1: intrigue_scheming.1802.g_medium_skill_desc0:"$intrigue_scheming.1802.intro_desc$\n\nThe schematics drawn upon the parchment make sense
column2: but there are a few outliers that don't fit in with our existing knowledge of [enemy.GetFirstNamePossessive] typical strategy."
but something seems afoul... though I can't put my finger on it."

column1: intrigue_scheming.1802.fallback_desc0:"$intrigue_scheming.1802.intro_desc$\n\nIt is nearly impossible to tell whether these plans are genuine or not."

column2: I find far too many glaring errors in these plans for them to be genuine. I've been had!"

column1: intrigue_scheming.1803.f_medium_skill_desc0:"$intrigue_scheming.1802.intro_desc$\n\nSome of the details described by the plans make sense
column2: but many of them do not follow with what we know of [enemy.GetFirstNamePossessive] typical defense strategy."

column1: intrigue_scheming.1804.genuine_info_desc0:"Word has just returned from my forces laying siege to the [barony.GetName] in my war against [enemy.GetTitledFirstName]. They report the information we received from the anonymous informant to be genuine!\n\nWith this inside knowledge of [enemy.GetFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] defense tactics
column2: they were able to take the [enemy.Custom('FortifiedBuilding')] in record time. Victory seems all but assured!"

column1: intrigue_scheming.1804.fake_info_desc0:"Word has just returned from my forces laying siege to the [barony.GetName] in my war against [enemy.GetTitledFirstName]. They report the information we received from the anonymous informant to be false!\n\nThey were able to take the [enemy.Custom('FortifiedBuilding')] nevertheless
column2: but the road ahead will be challenging."

column1: intrigue_scheming.1804.rejected_fake_info_desc0:"Word has just returned from my forces laying siege to the [barony.GetName] in my war against [enemy.GetTitledFirstName]. They report the information we received from the anonymous informant to be false!\n\nThank [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HighGodName] I did not choose to act on those fraudulent documents!"

column2: if I do say so myself."
